entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pinawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
